text: Taikhan sob adharmikta pora bhorta hoi kene ase, biya kaam kora manu, lalchi kora manu, aru dusra ke dukh kori bole diya manu. Taikhan suku jola pora bhorta hoi kene ase, morai diya, khong uthi kene kotha namila, manu ke thogai diye, aru biya bhabona kori thake. Taikhan manu laga biya kotha koi thake,
